about_the_game:
Inspired by the classic Ragnarok Online, Project Forgemaster is an aRPG where you are a Forgeborn, evoked by the king to face the shadows of the world. Being born from the forge allows you to grow your abilities compared to the locals of the realm. You were born to fulfill a destiny, and it's your time to forgemaster on your way.

In this Prototype/concept demo, you will find a challenge from levels 1 to 12. The idea behind It is to show people that a game inspired by RO is in the making! and create an ongoing community around It!
